snoopy.blindnote: sno/scaRNAs with same target 18S rRNA U34 : SNORA50,SNORA76. sno/scaRNAs with same target 18S rRNA U105 : SNORA8 SNORA50 SNORA36A SNORA36B SNORA76。 (20100622末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIがアクセスできないためaccession Noは保留,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。 (20100623末安)accession Noを加えた。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss, A. M., Jady, B. E., Bertrand, E., and Kiss, T. (2004). Human box H/ACA pseudouridylation guide RNA machinery. Mol. Cell .Biol. 24, 5797-5807, Maden, E. H., and Wakeman, J. A. (1988). Pseudouridine distribution in mammalian 18 S ribosomal RNA. A major cluster in the central region of the molecule. Biochem J 249, 459-464.
